sources.title: PyMuPDF Documentation: Text and Image Extraction
sources.synthesis: PyMuPDF provides fast PDF parsing with layout-aware text extraction, table detection, and image extraction. Supports rendering and manipulation of PDF content.

sources.title: Apache Parquet Format Specification
sources.synthesis: Parquet provides columnar storage with compression and encoding. Optimized for analytical queries. Supports complex nested structures.

sources.title: Web Scraping Best Practices and Ethics
sources.synthesis: Respectful scraping requires delays, robots.txt compliance, user-agent identification. Rate limiting prevents server overload.
